data.title: Argentina - Energy Efficiency Labelling
data.meta_description: Acquire Argentina’s energy efficiency certificate for electrical products
data.text: The Argentine government aims to motivate consumers to buy energy efficient products. They have mandated that certain products that consume energy be labeled with an efficiency level. Level A is most efficient. We provide direct energy efficiency label certification services for products that consume electricity and are to be sold in Argentina, whether they are manufactured locally or imported. TÜV Rheinland is recognized by the Argentine government and accredited by the Argentine Accreditation Body (OAA) to certify the energy efficiency level of products that consume electricity. Contact us now!
